name: UFO Madness
description:
Description

Drive your alien spaceship across misterious farmlands, abduce everything on your sorrounding and visit the store to unlock power ups. Try not to die while abducing cows, chickens and even deads in this fun and addictive game.

How to play

  • Use keyboard arrows for steering
  • Press 'Q' to open the shop
  • Buy powerups with the letter 'E'

Unlockeable power ups

Big Laser : Increase the radius of abduction beam
Energy x2 : Receive double points
Stability : Improve ability to drive UFO
Slow Motion: Reduce speed of enviroment
Invisible : Fly through obstacle

Thanks to

Incredible team for testing and support

Letting us use the fantastic main song: Encounter With a Mech Patrol Unit by @ibrahim
